title: Leader of club, still not showing up @Riot
body:
Hey. As I am aware the club system has been resolved however I am still unable to access the club I founded. All the members are able to access it now although I still can't. Would like some help to resolve this! Club tag is "Ebon".

Thanks

replies.body: I am also having this problem with my clan :(
I posted under the wrong account
I am also having this issue. Clan name is TeamWork is Dreamwork and clan tag is Kiwy . I am the owner but unable to see the club upon logging in or use the tag.
Good to go!  Relog when you get a chance and let me know!

i am also having this issue please contact me soon I desperately want my club back, also if you could I have another issue i need resolved if you can look into it.  Im sure you can just look at my board posts.  thanks for the help :D
Still having the issue myself. Club tag is LEDD.
I gotcha!  Can you relog for me, and check again?  Let me know!
Looks to be working. Thanks!
I am also having this issue still, club is Corvidae, tag CORAX.

mine is messing up also, club name is Savy, club tag is Savie, please fix this, all my buddys are fine showin up great but im the leader and nothing, the see that im the leader and all but nothing for me on my end, pls and ty fix
does no one see of answer these at all ? club name is Savvy, club tag is Savie, HergerTheJoyous is my name
i am having this same issue, clan name is Savie
I am having this problem is well. Everyone else in the club still has me listed as the leader. Club is TwoBoots [2B8TS].

Hello all,
@Porocles : Hey we've been having the same issue in my club.   The leader is a filthy casual and hasnt contacted you about the issue yet xD  But we're hoping you can help us!

Leader:     "scramblesthe"
Club:  "Formula 4 the Apocalypse"
Tag:   "Form4"


Thanks Riot for your time...   time to log in and see if i can use my Urf the Manatee skin or if warwick will once again be banned every game  <3
ps   ty for dj sona, no surprise it was as popular as i told you it would be :P

Hey same issue here. euw server.

Club name: twenteffs
Club tag:#tbag

been having problems foe a wile now i'd love some help xD. mutch love!
I am having the issue as well, I can not see that I am in the club but friends can see me in the club and that I am never online. I would like this fixed if possible.
What's the club name and tag?

Name = Suck Focialism
Tag = Pus*y

Yes we are children, Sorry I took a while to respond, finals in college coming up!

Hello, 

I've been waiting for my club to reappear but it seems like that won't be happening..
would it be alright if you looked into mine too?

Thank you!
Everything looks okay here.  Let me know if not!
Thank you so much!!!!
Also having this issue on EUW with my clan, Clan name is: B00STED DREAMS  Would love this to be fixed!
Would be great if this could be looked into.
@Riot I have the same issue with my (own it) club Tr1p i thought this issue would resove itself but it still isnt appearing anywhere. please help me if you can , THANKS!

Club Name: Logistics
Club Tag: Tr1p
Still having the issue. Im founder of LESBIAN LOVE STORY. My club doesn't even show up.
Same Issue Tag is Bay2G
Also having that issue.  D: I have had my friends check their club roster and I am still on it. It's just gone for me... Says 0/3 in my club tab.
I'd like to take a look!  What's the name and tag of your club?

Club name: Monocled Ruffians
Tag:  ;OmO

Thank you so much!
Should be good to go now!  Let me know.  :D

It has been fixed!!
Many thanks ^.^
I poked your club and checked for issues!  Everything looks okay and tidied up!  Let me know if you're still having an issue.

Hey, I have the Same Issue. Can you Please help me?
